DOC.brief_summary: The influence specific dietary fat source satiety , appetite energy utilization remain unclear ; evidence lack whether response vary accord acute intake . The researcher use control set determine whether source dietary fat relate perceive satiety , satiety hormone response , energy expenditure conduct experiment evaluate short term ( acute ) effect .
